# The `GCNMinRegStrategy.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines and implements the class <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gcnminregstrategy-cpp-/gcnminregscheduler">GCNMinRegScheduler</a>, which implements an experimental, simple scheduler whose main goal is to learn ways about consuming less possible registers for a region. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file defines and implements the class <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-gcnminregstrategy-cpp-/gcnminregscheduler">GCNMinRegScheduler</a>, which implements an experimental, simple scheduler whose main goal is to learn ways about consuming less possible registers for a region.
